scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.start-full: npm run build-only && npx parcel serve src/index.html -d dist
scripts.start: npx tsc && npm run copy && npx parcel serve src/index.html -d dist  --no-cache --no-source-maps   --no-hmr
scripts.start-sourcemaps: npx tsc && npm run copy && npx parcel serve src/index.html -d dist  --no-cache  --no-hmr
scripts.copy: FILES="node_modules/mirada/dist/src/opencv.js static/* node_modules/magica/dist/src/imageMagick/compiled/magick.wasm" && mkdir -p dist docs && cp -r $FILES dist && cp -r $FILES docs
scripts.build: npm run clean  && npm run build-only && export NODE_ENV=production && node --max-old-space-size=5000 node_modules/parcel/bin/cli.js build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/mirada-playground && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/mirada-playground &&  mv docs/* ../../demos/docs/mirada-playground/
scripts.build-only: P=$PWD &&  cd ../mirada && npm run build && npm run copy && cd "$P" && npx tsc && npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
